feed.title: Portage la Prairie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Portage la Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Portage Southport Airport 8:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NE 34 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
